snippet: President Xi Jinping’s three-day visit was intended to smooth ties between Mexico and China, which have been rivals in exports to the United States.

byline.contributor: Karla Zabludovsky contributed reporting from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: President Xi Jinping’s three-day visit was intended to smooth ties between Mexico and China, which have been rivals in exports to the United States.

headline.seo: Xi Makes Bridge-Building Trip to Mexico
headline.main: Chinese President Makes Bridge-Building Trip to Mexico
headline.print_headline: Chinese President Makes Bridge-Building Trip to Mexico
